statement.paragraph: rainfall_mi is a string that contains the average number of inches of rainfall in Michigan for every month (in inches) with every month separated by a comma. Write code to compute the number of months that have more than 3 inches of rainfall. Store the result in the variable num_rainy_months. In other words, count the number of items with values > 3.0.
Hard-coded answers will receive no credit.

statement.paragraph: Write code that counts the number of words in sentence that contain either an “a” or an “e”. Store the result in the variable num_a_or_e.

HINT 1: Use the in operator.
HINT 2: You can either use or or elif.
Hard-coded answers will receive no credit.
